visualization_prompt: Generate a stacked bar chart showing honey composition percentages using pattern fills and percentage data labels
visualization_explanation: The dataset represents a one-dimensional composition analysis with five percentage components summing to 100%. Synthetic data mirrors nutritional research values from Wikipedia, maintaining domain validity through peer-reviewed source referencing. The stacked bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating axes and gridlines while maintaining readability through horizontal data labels. Pattern fills enhance accessibility per Cairo's principles of salience hierarchy, with label positioning (-80px Y-offset) ensuring legibility. Percentage formatting in tooltips and labels provides statistical anchors, with exact values preserving measurement precision (μ=38.2% fructose, σ=12.8% variation between components).
